location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pen and ink on tracing clothDimensions:838 x 519 mm, on sheet 1027 x 763 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Tracing of a map of the Qatar Peninsula dated 8th September 1937, sent in reference to the Residency Express letter No. 839-S.Shows the proposed Saudi-Qatar border with motor routes indicated by red pecked lines and location of wells marked. Contains a key to symbols in the lower left-hand corner.
